name: Pitch (itch) (thanerose)
description:
‘Pitch’ is a 2D pixel style game that was developed in Unity’s 2D engine. It takes the player on a tour of four different sea levels, each represented by a colour. The player must complete unique puzzles in each area to proceed to the surface.

‘Pitch’ was created in three months using Unity, Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator. All of the design and programming was done by me.
